Description: Rim sherd of Chian Mature Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky black below; exterior: band of 'S' between narrow brown bands; below, painted decoration consisting of a curved brown horizontal line, possibly part of the head and curlicue of a sphinx, to left.
Bibliographic references: Lemos 1991 / Archaic Pottery of Chios. The Decorated Styles (p. 260, no. 513)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0484) (phase 2)
